document.full_text: as long as the n.f.l. lockout continues, no signings, trades, practices or games will take place. but the ripple effects from this work stoppage are potentially more unsettling.
document.title: in lockout, loopholes replace regulations
lines_and_colors: as long as the n.f.l. lockout continues, no signings, trades, practices or games will take place. but the ripple effects from this work stoppage are potentially more unsettling.
